WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BERMUDA.
DNC 16, DNC 17.
140 FOOT F/V YACHT HOP, BLUE HULL, ON FIRE VICINITY
32-00N 065-00W AT 131323Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK, PHONE: 757 398 6231,
